columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in

columns.name: operatedTransportMovement
columns.description: Transport Movement on which the Transport Means is used

columns.name: vehicleType
columns.description: Vehicle or container type. Refer UNECE28; e.g. 4.. - Aircraft; type unknown.For Air refer to IATA Standard Schedules Information Manua in section ATA/IATA Aircraft Types

columns.name: vehicleModel
columns.description: Model or make of the vehicle (e.g. A33-3)

columns.name: vehicleRegistration
columns.description: Vehicle identification - e.g. aircraft registration number

columns.name: vehicleSize
columns.description: Size of the vehicle - free text
